feed.title: CUNY-nomic
feed.subtitle: The game Nomic played as part of the course on Programming and Hacking Communities.

entry.title: Minutes 2025-10-07
entry.content:
Minutes – Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

Date: October 7, 2025
Time: 2:00 PM
Meeting called to order: 2:47 PM

Chair: Heather Roberts
Secretary: Cheng Ning

Present: Mikael Vejdemo Johansson (MVJ), Jonathan Hanon (JH), Cheng Ning (CN), Isa Jafarov (IJ), OlgaKey (OK), Heather Roberts (HR), Jesse Dimino (JD)
Absent: Beam, Dan Weiner (DW), Cesar Herrera (CH)

Agenda

  1. Approval of Agenda
  2. Approval of Minutes (9/16)
  3. Postpone Minutes (9/9)
  4. Issue Trackers
    • a. Pull Request #106
    • b. Pull Request #108
    • c. Pull Request #109
  5. New Business

Item 1. Approval of Agenda

Motion: To approve the agenda.
Moved by: MVJ
Seconded by: JH
Vote: Carried unanimously.

Item 2. Approval of Minutes (9/16)

Motion: To postpone approval of the minutes from September 16.
Moved by: HR
Vote: Carried unanimously.
Result: Minutes from 9/16 postponed.

Item 3. Postpone Minutes (9/9)

Motion: To postpone approval of the minutes from September 9.
Vote:
Aye – MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, CN
Nay – None
Result: Carried unanimously.

Item 4a. Pull Request #106

Motion: By DW to amend Rule 206.
Seconded by: Discussion was started without a second Vote:
Aye – None
Nay – MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, CN
Result: Motion fails

Item 4b. Pull Request #108

Motion: By MVJ to amend Rule 108.
Vote:
Aye – MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, CN
Nay – None
Result: Motion carried unanimously.

Item 4c. Pull Request #109

Motion: By MVJ to amend Rule 209 and rename it to Rule 409.
Seconded by: OK

First Amendment

Moved by: JH
Amendment: to add You can’t resubmit in order to to get higher score Action: Withdrawn by motion by JH with unanimous consent. (No vote taken.)

Second Amendment

Moved by: MVJ
Amendment: To add “rounded up to the nearest integer” to the last sentence.
Vote:
Aye – MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, CN
Nay – None
Result: Amendment carried.

Third Amendment

Moved by: JH
Amendment: To insert “taking the square root, multiplying by 16,” after “reading off the bottom byte,” in the same sentence. Vote:
Aye – MVJ, JH, HR, JD, OK
Nay – IJ, CN
Result: Amendment carried.

Final Motion (as amended):
Rule 209 is amended and renamed Rule 409, with the revised sentence reading as follows:

“A player scores points computed by taking the Git hash of the first commit in the pull request, reading off the bottom byte, taking the square root, multiplying by 16, and multiplying the resulting number by the fraction of votes in favor of the rule change, rounded up to the nearest integer.”

Vote:
Aye – MVJ, JH, IJ, CN, JD, OK
Nay – HR

Result: Motion carried.

Points Update

  • MVJ gains ∞ points (Total: ∞)
  • JH gains ∞ points (Total: ∞)
  • HR gains 10 points (Total: 127)

Item 5. New Business

No new business introduced.

Adjournment:
Meeting adjourned at 3:50 PM by Chair HR.
entry.summary: Minutes – Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

entry.title: Minutes 2025-09-16
entry.content:
Minutes - Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

9/16/2025, 2:00pm

Meeting Chair (Товарищ Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe):
Beam
Meeting Secretary (Товарищ The Oracle Knower of All Speaker to the Stars):
OlgaKey
Present (Товарищи):
Jonathan Hanon (JH), Cesar Herrera (CH), Heather Roberts (HR), Jesse Dimino (JD), Isa Jafarov (IJ), Dan Weiner (DW), Cheng Ning (CN), Beam, OlgaKey (OK), Mikael Vejdemo-Johansson (MVJ)
Absent:
None

Meeting called to order at 2:59pm

Proposal for agenda:

  1. Approving the agenda
  2. Approval of the minutes from the last meeting
  3. Propose and vote on rule changes 3a. Pull Request 103 by Товарищ Isa 3b. Pull Request 104 by Товарищ Mikael 3c. Pull Request 105 by Товарищ Heather 3d. Pull Request 106 by Товарищ Dan
  4. New Business

Item 1. Approving the Agenda

Agenda moved by JD, Seconded by OK

The agenda carries unanimously

Item 2. Approval of the minutes from the last meeting

Incidental motion: minutes were incomplete. Request to add the minutes. Will be discussed at the next meeting Mikael moved second by Heather

Aye: JH, CH, HR, JD, IJ, DW, CN, Beam, OK, MVJ Nay: None Passed unanimously

Item 3a. Pull Request #103 (formatted incorrectly as Rule 403 and 404) by Tavaresh Isa

Before the floor: JD and MVJ asked if IJ is willing to combine both conditions into one proposal amend the proposal to fuse both conditions into one rule. IJ: proposes to skip the rule change labeled 403 and discuss only the one labeled 404

Motion by pull request by IJ to create a new rule 403: If a player needs more time to think about the matter before voting, he/she may request to postpone voting to the next plenary session. Second by: no need to be second because the discussion started

Aye: JH, IJ Nay: CH, HR, JD, DW, CN, Beam, OK, MVJ

The motion fails.

Point updates: IJ loses 10

Item 3b. Pull Request #104

Motion by pull request by MVJ to create a new Rule 404: Any number stated with numerals in the body of mutable rules is to be doubled before interpreting the rule. Any number spelled out with letters remains unchanged. Seconded by JD

JH: Motion to amend the rule proposal to change the phrasing of “to be doubled” to “to be multiplied by 2” Seconded by MVJ

Olga: Motion to amend an amendment: change “2” to “5” Seconded by JH

Votes for amendment to the amendment (multiply by 5): Aye: JH, JD, OK Nay: CH, HR, IJ, DW, CN, Beam, MVJ Amendment to amendment failed

Votes for the amendment (multiplied by 2): Aye: JH, CH, JD, IJ Nay: HR, DW, CN, Beam, OK, MVJ Amedmant failed

Votes for the rule: Aye: JH, JD, DW, MVJ Nay: CH, HR, IJ, CN, Beam, OK, Rule 404 failed

MVJ loses 10

Item 3c. Pull Request #105

Motion by pull request by HB to create a new Rule 405: If a vote passes with an amendment, the player who introduced the amendment retains half the points, rounded up to the nearest integer, of the player who introduced the new rule. Seconded by OK

JH: motion to amend: If a rule change passes with an amendment, each player who introduced an adopted amendment to the rule change will be awarded points equal to half of the points awarded to the player who proposed the rule change, rounded up to the nearest integer. Seconded by DW

Votes for the amendment: Aye: JH, CH, HR, JD, DW, CN, Beam, MVJ Nay: IJ, OK, Amendment to the rule passed

Votes for the rule: Aye: JH, HR, IJ, DW, CN, Beam, Nay: CH, JD, OK, MVJ Rule passes

Heather got 69 points JH got 35

Item 4. New Business

No new business introduced.

Beam adjourns the meeting at 3:53pm
entry.summary: Minutes - Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

entry.title: Minutes 2025-09-09
entry.content:
Minutes - Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

9/9/2025, 2:00pm

Meeting Chair:
Jonathan Hanon
Meeting Secretary:
Beam
Present:
Mikael Vejdemo Johansson (MVJ), Cheng Ning (CN), Jonathan Hanon (JH), OlgaKey (OK), Isa Jafarov (IJ), Beam, Dan Weiner (DW), Heather Roberts (HR), Cesar Herrera (CH), Jesse Dimino (JD)

Meeting called to order at 3:09pm

Proposal for agenda:

  1. Approving the agenda
  2. Approving the minutes

  3. Discussion of poll requests and rules

    a. 401
    b. 402

  4. New Business

Item 1. Approving the Agenda

Agenda moved by CH, seconded by JD

Agenda carries unanimously

Item 2. Approving the minutes

Minor corrections were applied to the minutes document

Thereafter, approval of the minutes moved by MVJ. No objections followed.

Approval of the minutes carries unanimously

Item 3a. Pull Request #101

Motion by pull request by Beam to create Rule 401:

During any voting, a player may vote for the matter, against the matter, or abstain from voting.

Motion by JH to suspend the rules to allow DW, who hasn’t been added to the players’ list yet, to speak during discussions.

  • Motion approved unanimously.

Motion by JH to suspend the rules to allow players to speak more than once during discussion.

  • Motion approved unanimously.

CH proposes an amendment to change the text of the proposed rule 401 to:

During any voting, a player may vote for the matter, against the matter, or abstain from voting. If a person abstains, they lose 2 points.

CH proposes an amendment to the amendment to change the text of the proposed rule 401 to:

During any voting, a player may vote for the matter, against the matter, or abstain from voting. If a player abstains from a rule-change voting, they lose 2 points.

Vote on the amendment to the amendment:

  • The amendment to the amendment passes unanimously.
  • The proposed rule 401 therefore becomes:

    During any voting, a player may vote for the matter, against the matter, or abstain from voting. If a player abstains from a rule-change voting, they lose 2 points.

OK proposes an amendment to the amendment to change the text of the proposed rule 401 to:

During any voting, a player may vote for the matter, against the matter, or abstain from voting. If a player abstains from a rule-change voting, they lose 20 points.

Vote on the amendment to the amendment:

  • Aye: OK
  • Nay: CN, MVJ, IJ, JD, JH, OK, CH, HR, DW
  • The amendment to the amendment fails.

Vote on the amendment to change the text of the proposed rule 401 to:

During any voting, a player may vote for the matter, against the matter, or abstain from voting. If a player abstains from a rule-change voting, they lose 2 points.

  • Aye: MVJ, OK, CH, Beam, DW
  • Nay: JD, HR, IJ, CN, JH
  • The amendment fails.

Calling to question: all are in favor.

Vote on the motion to create Rule 401:

During any voting, a player may vote for the matter, against the matter, or abstain from voting. If a player abstains from a rule-change voting, they lose 2 points.

  • Aye: CN
  • Nay: MVJ, IJ, JD, JH, OK, CH, Beam, HR, DW
  • The motion fails.

Point updates: Beam loses 10 points (Total: -20)

Item 3b. Pull Request #102

Motion by pull request by CH to create Rule 402:

Acting chairperson will be recognized “Supreme Leader” and Secretary will be recognized as “The Oracle” in meetings.

MVJ proposes an amendment to change the text of the proposed rule 402 to:

Acting chairperson will be recognized “Tovarich Supreme Leader” and Secretary will be recognized as “Tovarich The Oracle” in meetings.

JD proposes an amendment to the amendment to change the text of the proposed rule 402 to:

Acting chairperson will be recognized “Tovarich Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Tovarich The Oracle” in meetings.

Vote on the amendment to the amendment:

  • Aye: MVJ, IJ, CH, Beam, DW, JD, JH, CN
  • Nay: OK, HR
  • The amendment to the amendment passes.
  • The updated text of the amendment to the proposed rule 402 is:

    Acting chairperson will be recognized “Tovarich Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Tovarich The Oracle” in meetings.

Beam proposes an amendment to the amendment to change the text of the proposed rule 402 to:

Acting chairperson will be recognized “Tovarishch Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Tovarishch The Oracle” in meetings.

Vote on the amendment to the amendment:

  • Aye: MVJ, IJ, CH, Beam, DW, JD, JH, CN
  • Nay: OK, HR
  • The amendment to the amendment passes.
  • The updated text of the amendment to the proposed rule 402 is:

    Acting chairperson will be recognized “Tovarishch Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Tovarishch The Oracle” in meetings.

OK proposes an amendment to the amendment to change the text of the proposed rule 402 to:

Acting chairperson will be recognized “Товарищ Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Товарищ The Oracle” in meetings.

Vote on the amendment to the amendment:

  • Aye: OK, MVJ, IJ, CH, Beam, DW, JD, JH, CN
  • Nay: HR
  • The amendment to the amendment passes.
  • The updated text of the amendment to the proposed rule 402 is:

    Acting chairperson will be recognized “Товарищ Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Товарищ The Oracle” in meetings.

CH proposes an amendment to the amendment to change the text of the proposed rule 402 to:

Acting chairperson will be recognized “Товарищ Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Товарищ The Oracle Knower of All Speaker to the Stars” in meetings.

Vote on the amendment to the amendment:

  • Aye: OK, MVJ, CH, Beam, DW, JD, JH, CN
  • Nay: HR, IJ
  • The amendment to the amendment passes.
  • The updated text of the amendment to the proposed rule 402 is:

    Acting chairperson will be recognized “Товарищ Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Товарищ The Oracle Knower of All Speaker to the Stars” in meetings.

Vote on the amendment:

  • Aye: MVJ, CH, IJ, Beam, DW, JD, JH
  • Nay: OK, HR, CN
  • The amendment passes.
  • The updated text of the proposed rule 402 is:

    Acting chairperson will be recognized “Товарищ Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Товарищ The Oracle Knower of All Speaker to the Stars” in meetings.

IJ proposes an amendment to change the text of the proposed rule 402 to:

Acting chairperson will be recognized “Товарищ Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Товарищ The Oracle Knower of All Speaker to the Stars” in meetings. The players will be recognized as “товарищи”.

Calling to question (on the amendment): passes unanimously.

Vote on the amendment:

  • Aye: CN, MVJ, OK, CH, IJ, Beam, DW, JD, JH
  • Nay: HR
  • The amendment passes.
  • The updated text of the proposed rule 402 is:

    Acting chairperson will be recognized “Товарищ Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Товарищ The Oracle Knower of All Speaker to the Stars” in meetings. The players will be recognized as “товарищи”.

Calling to question (on rule 402) - vote results:

  • Aye: HR, CN, MVJ, OK, CH, IJ, Beam, DW, JH
  • Nay: JD
  • Motion to call to question passes.

Vote on rule 402:

  • Aye: MVJ, IJ, OK, CH, Beam, DW
  • Nay: JD, JH, HR, CN
  • The motion carries with 6 out of 10 voting members present approving, making the approval worth 67 points.
  • The text of the new rule 402 is hereby:

    Acting chairperson will be recognized “Товарищ Supreme Leader Grand Khan of the Universe” and Secretary will be recognized as “Товарищ The Oracle Knower of All Speaker to the Stars” in meetings. The players will be recognized as “товарищи”.

Point updates: JD gains 10 points (Total: 0) JH gains 10 points (Total: 94) HR gains 10 points (Total: 0) CN gains 10 points (Total: 10) CH gains 67 points (Total: 57)

Item 3. New Business

No new business introduced.

JH adjourns the meeting at 3:58pm
entry.summary: Minutes - Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

entry.title: Minutes 2025-09-02
entry.content:
Minutes - Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

09/02/2025, 2:00pm

Meeting Chair:
Jesse Dimino
Meeting Secretary:
Cesar Herrera

Present: Mikael Vejdemo Johansson (MVJ), Jonathan Hanon (JH), Olga Kliuchnik (OK), Beam, Heather Roberts (HR), Cesar Herrera (CH), Jesse Dimino (JD), Isa Jafarov (IJ) Absent: Cheng Ning (CN)

Meeting called to order at 2:53pm

Proposal for agenda:

  1. Review previous agenda
  2. Discuss Rule Changes

Item 1. Reviewing Previous Agenda

Agenda reveiwed

Item 2a. Pull Request #390

Motion by pull request by Beam to Create Rule 390

MVJ proposes amendment to strikeout last sentence MVJ amends his amendent to not strikeout and instead replace the last sentence with: “This minimum is 3”

Vote on amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, OK, Beam, CH Nay: HR, IJ

The Amendment passes

Vote on motion Aye: Beam, HR, OK, IJ Nay: MVJ, JH, CH, JD

The motion fails

Point updates: Beam loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2b. Pull Request #391

Motion by pull request by OK to Create Rule 391

MVJ proposes amendment to change the short name of the rule from “Clarity Bonus” to “Jabberwocky”

Vote on amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD Nay: IJ, OK, Beam, CH

The Amendment fails

CH proposes an amendment to crossout the second line item and the number 1 from the first

MVJ proposes second degree amendment is to remove the word Bonus from “Clarity Bonus”

Vote on second amendment Aye: Beam, OK, IJ, MVJ, JH, CH, JD Nay: HR

Second degree amendment is passed

Vote on amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH Nay:

The amendment passes unanimously

JH proposes amendment to change “new rule” to “newly enacted, amended, or transmuted”

JH proposes second amendment from “newly enacted, amended, or transmuted” to “every new or changed rule”

Vote on second amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH Nay:

The second amendment passes unanimously

Vote on amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH Nay:

The amendment passes unanimously

Vote on motion Aye: JD, CH, OK Nay: MVJ, JH, HR, IJ, Beam

The motion fails

Point updates: OK loses 10 points (Total: 0)

Item 2c. Pull Request #393

Motion by pull request by OK to Create Rule 393

MVJ proposes amended to strikeout line 4 (short name)

Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH Nay:

The amendment passes unanimously

Aye: OK Nay: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH

The motion fails

Point updates: OK loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2d. Pull Request #394

Motion by pull request by JD to Remove Rule 210

Aye: JD, IJ, Beam Nay: OK, MVJ, JH, HR, CH

The motion fails

Point updates: JD loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2e. Pull Request #395

Motion by pull request by HR to Create Rule 389 Vote to call to call to question passes

Aye: HR Nay: MVJ, JH, OK, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH

The motion fails

Point updates: HR loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2f. Pull Request #396

Motion by pull request by CH to Create Rule 394

Vote to call to call to question passes

Aye: CH, IJ, MVJ Nay: HR, JH, OK, JD, OK, Beam

The motion fails

Point updates: CH loses 10 points (Total: -10)

JD adjourns the meeting at 4:02 pm

title: Minutes 2025-09-02 layout: post author: Cesar Herrera —

Minutes - Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

09/02/2025, 2:00pm

Meeting Chair:
Jesse Dimino
Meeting Secretary:
Cesar Herrera

Present: Mikael Vejdemo Johansson (MVJ), Jonathan Hanon (JH), Olga Kliuchnik (OK), Beam, Heather Roberts (HR), Cesar Herrera (CH), Jesse Dimino (JD), Isa Jafarov (IJ) Absent: Cheng Ning (CN)

Meeting called to order at 2:53pm

Proposal for agenda:

  1. Review previous agenda
  2. Discuss Rule Changes

Item 1. Reviewing Previous Agenda

Agenda reveiwed

Item 2a. Pull Request #390

Motion by pull request by Beam to Create Rule 390

MVJ proposes amendment to strikeout last sentence MVJ amends his amendent to not strikeout and instead replace the last sentence with: “This minimum is 3”

Vote on amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, OK, Beam, CH Nay: HR, IJ

The Amendment passes

Vote on motion Aye: Beam, HR, OK, IJ Nay: MVJ, JH, CH, JD

The motion fails

Point updates: Beam loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2b. Pull Request #391

MVJ proposes amendment to change the short name of the rule from “Clarity Bonus” to “Jabberwocky”

Vote on amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD Nay: IJ, OK, Beam, CH

The Amendment fails

CH proposes an amendment to crossout the second line item and the number 1 from the first

MVJ proposes second degree amendment is to remove the word Bonus from “Clarity Bonus”

Vote on second amendment Aye: Beam, OK, IJ, MVJ, JH, CH, JD Nay: HR

Second degree amendment is passed

The amendment passes unanimously

JH proposes amendment to change “new rule” to “newly enacted, amended, or transmuted”

JH proposes second amendment from “newly enacted, amended, or transmuted” to “every new or changed rule”

Vote on second amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH Nay:

The second amendment passes unanimously

Vote on amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH Nay:

The motion fails

MVJ proposes amended to strikeout line 4 (short name)

The motion fails

Point updates: OK loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2d. Pull Request #394

Motion by pull request by JD to Remove Rule 210

Aye: JD, IJ, Beam Nay: OK, MVJ, JH, HR, CH

The motion fails

Point updates: JD loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2e. Pull Request #395

Motion by pull request by HR to Create Rule 389 Vote to call to call to question passes

Aye: HR Nay: MVJ, JH, OK, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH

The motion fails

Item 2f. Pull Request #396

Motion by pull request by CH to Create Rule 394

Vote to call to call to question passes

Aye: CH, IJ, MVJ Nay: HR, JH, OK, JD, OK, Beam

The motion fails

Point updates: CH loses 10 points (Total: -10)

JD adjourns the meeting at 4:02 pm

entry.title: Minutes 2025-08-26
entry.content:
Minutes - Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

8/26/2025, 2:00pm

Meeting Chair:
Mikael Vejdemo-Johansson
Meeting Secretary:
Jonathan Hanon
Present:
Mikael Vejdemo Johansson (MVJ), Jonathan Hanon (JH), Olga Kliuchnik (OK), Beam, Heather Roberts (HR), Cesar Herrera (CH), Jesse Dimino (JD)
Absent:
Cheng Ning (CN), Isa Jafarov (IJ)

Meeting called to order at 3:26pm

Proposal for agenda:

  1. Approving the agenda
  2. Propose and vote on rule changes
  3. New Business

Item 1. Approving the Agenda

Agenda moved by HR, seconded by JD

Agenda carries unanimously

Item 2a. Pull Request #87

Motion by pull request by MVJ to amend Rule 202

Aye: MVJ, JD Nay: JH, OK, MB, HR, CH

The motion fails.

Point updates: MVJ loses 10 (Total: -10)

Item 2b. Pull Request #88

Motion by pull request by JH to amend Rule 208

Aye: MVJ, JH, MB, HR, CH, JD Nay: OK

The motion carries with 6 out of 7 voting members present approving, making the approval worth 84 points.

Point updates: OK gains 10 points (Total: 10) JH gains 84 points (Total: 84)

Item 3. New Business

No new business introduced.

MVJ adjourns the meeting at 3:46pm
entry.summary: Minutes - Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

entry.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
entry.content:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

Jekyll requires blog post files to be named according to the following format:

YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.MARKUP

Where YEAR is a four-digit number, MONTH and DAY are both two-digit numbers, and MARKUP is the file extension representing the format used in the file. After that, include the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
entry.summary: You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.
